description.en: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?
description.ja: 婚約者の王太子から処刑を言い渡された令嬢・ジル。その死の間際に、婚約が決まった当時10歳のパーティーまで時が巻き戻る！破滅ルートを回避するべくとっさに後ろにいた人に求婚するが、相手は最大の敵、隣国の闇落ち（予定）皇帝・ハディスだった――。「あなたを必ず更生――いえ、しあわせにいたします。」

description.en: Tludia was on her way to become a Knight within the Order when she was unexpectedly kicked out for breaking too many weapons and – wait for it – eating too much. But that doesn’t mean she should stand idly by when she witnesses an old man about to be attacked by a band of robbers. Luckily for her – because she was a second too late – the old man did not need saving. It’s Tludia that needs saving. Much older than his appearance suggests, Tludia rekindles a long lost memory in him, and he decides to repay her for her efforts by finding a cure for her disease (with promises of food, of course). Thus begins their journey to bring life to one, and long-awaited peace to the other.

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.

altTitles.ja: 救済の日

description.en:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

altTitles.ja: 恋とか夢とかてんてんてん

description.en:
Kai-chan is a 29-year-old part-time worker who moved to Tokyo 10 years ago with dreams in mind. She is busy making a living, and time just passes by. She even gave up drawing, something she loved, because it was painful when she didn't get any "likes" from anyone when she posted her pictures on social media. Meanwhile, Kai-chan falls in love and moves from Tokyo to Osaka! A story of love and dreams that keeps rolling in for Kai-chan, whose first unrequited love of her life is unstoppable.

2nd placer of the women's edition of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2025", just behind the winner "Tamaki & Amane".

altTitles.ja: ネガチブレイン

description.en:
Yumewo is such a negative pessimist that his power to see the future in his dreams only lets him see bad things that will happen to him. In a world where nothing goes right for him, can Yumewo remake himself to become a more positive person?  
  
Originally published in Big Comic Spirits in 2011 to celebrate the magazine's 30th anniversary.

description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: カムイ伝全集

description.en:
A spin-off work starring Kamui, one of the main characters of Kamui-den.

The first 2 volumes were published in a Shounen magazine and ended with the 20th chapter in 1971. The manga changed art style and direction when it switched to a Seinen publication in 1988. The violent and sexual explicit part of the narrative was the basis for the American adaptation by Eclipse Comics in the 1980s and its unedited Viz re-release in 1999.
description.ja: 抜け忍・カムイの始末のため、日置領・竹間沢近辺の探索を命じられた三人の追忍。辻風のドド、矢張のソネ、荒草のハヤネと名乗る彼らは、それぞれ手裏剣、弓、吹き矢を得手としていたが、探索の傍ら、誰がスズメの群れを一度にたくさん打ち落とせるかを競い合うことに。すると、それを見ていた謎の乞食が「自分なら武器など使わず、もっとたくさん落とせる」と言い寄ってきて…。

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: きみの横顔を見ていた
Kimi no Yokogao o Miteita

altTitles.en: I See Your Face, Turned Away

description.en: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Mari’s, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad… right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.
description.fr:
Nous suivons le quotidien de quatre lycéens, deux filles et deux garçons, sur leur amitié parfois compliquée et leur amour non-partagé.

Hikari et Mari sont deux lycéennes qui s'entendent bien et qui sont amies. Hikari est une jeune fille plutôt banale et assez transparente alors que Mari est lumineuse. Elles se rapprochent petit à petit de Otani, un garçon bruyant et populaire et de son ami, Asagari, qui est plus calme et posé.
description.pt-br: Hikari é a típica caloura do ensino médio que recentemente sonhou acordada com a história de amor de Mari, sua tímida melhor amiga. Ela decide shippar Mari com Ootani-kun, seu colega de classe, depois de descobrir sobre sua paixão por Mari quando seu amigo, Asagiri-kun, tentou fazer os dois conversarem. A personagem principal é Mari, o protagonista é Ootani e Hikari é a típica melhor amiga da história. Nada mal... certo? Uma história juvenil entre quatro crianças passando por um amor não correspondido.

A short story about a girl who's new to being a ghost.

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: 孤高の人

description.en: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
description.ru:
В старшей школе Северной Ёкосуки новый, необычный ученик – Мори Бунтаро. В первый же день он отдает предпочтение крыше здания, чем ее кабинетам, где со всех сторон сыплются расспросы. Чтобы отвязаться от надоедливых одноклассников, лихо спрыгивающих с карниза вниз по веревке, Мори совершает безумный поступок: без страховки забирается на крышу по трубе, да еще в таком месте, где это достаточно проблематично, даже для тренированного человека! Одноклассник Миямото и Ониси-сенсей в ужасе и восторге, ведь они профессиональные скалолазы, а тут появляется такой способный ученик! Но Мори не разделяет их восторга и не принимает помощи. Нелюдимый и гордый, он всего добивается в одиночку, и трудности скалолазания его не пугают. Он собирается покорять вершину за вершиной, с каждый разом поднимаясь все выше.   
  
Note: Sakamoto Shinichi did both the story and the art from Volume 4 onwards.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Delcourt](https://www.editions-delcourt.fr/mangas/series/serie-ascension)
description.uz: Yangi o'rta maktabga ko'chib o'tganining birinchi kuni Mori Buntaru ismli yolg'iz o'quvchini sinfdoshi ko'ndirib maktab binosiga ko'tariladi. Bir xato qadam uni o'limga olib kelishi mumkinligini bilsa ham, u oldinga siljiydi va nihoyat cho'qqiga chiqqandan so'ng, Mori qoniqish hissini boshdan kechiradi. O‘sha tuyg‘u, go‘yo unga: “Sen tiriksan!” qoyaga chiqish uchun adrenalin tug'diradi.

description.en: Mannenrou Ladies' Academy is famous for its upper class and posh students. Despite knowing how out-of-place she'd be, the former yankee, Hanaizumi Luna, decides to enroll there. Moreover, according to her underling: "Girls' schools means yuri!! Add in school dormitories? Now that's a world of girl on girl action!!"

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

description.fr: Chu Lin est un jeune homme terriblement séduisant qui a énormément de succès auprès de la gent féminine, mais ses relations ne durent jamais bien longtemps. Après s'être de nouveau fait larguer, il traîne dans un bar où il rencontre Ziming, qui l'a sauvé d'une femme aux mauvaises intentions. Ce dernier lui propose alors une aventure d'un soir, mais Chu Lin lui oppose un refus catégorique ! Cependant, au moment où il se rappelle qu'il est dépourvu de gîte et de couvert, Chu Lin décide de revoir l'offre.

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: 潔癖男子！青山くん

description.en: Aoyama is a handsome young soccer genius who's a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
description.pl: Aoyama to przystojny, młody geniusz piłki nożnej, który reprezentuje Japonię. Jego styl gry to "czystość". Nie tackluje i nie główkuje piłki. Jeśli wykonuje wrzutkę, robi to tylko w rękawicach.

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

altTitles.ja: クッキングパパ

description.en:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: 日替わり尻尾の尾崎ちゃん

description.en: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
description.ja: 毎日尻尾が生え変わる女子高生、尾崎詩穂（おざきしほ）。彼女の誘いで毎日のように体育倉庫を訪れる先輩は、今日も尻尾で、耳で、なすがままにされてしまう。

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

altTitles.ja: はだかで恋を語る仲

altTitles.zh: 赤裸裸地探讨爱情的关系

description.en: One missed shot and this love affair is over. That's why I listen to her sexual experiences while soaking in the bathtub with her today. It's too hard to match body and soul! A new kind of public bathhouse romantic comedy is now open for business.

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

altTitles.vi: Meika-san Không Thể Thổ Lộ Tình Cảm Của Cô Ấy

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

altTitles.ja: コトダマ叶えて！ ときえ先生

altTitles.en: Through the Power of Words, Grant Me My Wishes, Tokie-sensei

description.en:
In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. 

From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.th: ตรงนั้นตรงนี้มีรัก

altTitles.ja: あっちこっち

description.en:
Feelings may come and go, but true love always remains in the heart. Tsumiki Miniwa is in love with her best friend, Io Otonashi. For her, confessing is nearly impossible; but to her friends, they seem to be the perfect match. Cute and petite, Tsumiki comes off more as a friend, and Io's attitude toward her is friendlier than toward others. Despite the constant teasing and obvious hints that his friends have been dropping, Io always seems to miss the signs.  
  
Throughout her everyday school life, Tsumiki spends time with her friends and Io. Will she finally muster enough courage to confess her true feelings?

title.en: Abandoned ~Tsuyosugite Buki ga Kowareru Yuusha to Buki Shokunin no Elf~

altTitles.ja: アバンダンド〜強すぎて武器が壊れる勇者と武器職人のエルフ〜

altTitles.en: Abandoned: The Hero Who's So Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith

altTitles.tr: Terk edilmiş: Her Silahı Kıracak Kadar Güçlü Kahraman ve Elf Silah Ustası

description.en: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
description.pt-br: À beira da morte, o guerreiro mais forte da humanidade, Ang, misteriosamente reencarna sessenta anos no futuro com a força do “Demônio mais Forte” — uma espada perigosa de dois gumes. Para resolver suas queixas e revelar a verdade, Ang não tem escolha a não ser “evoluir” continuamente em uma tentativa de fuga de seu destino passado. “Não vou deixar que eu me torne um demônio! Se quero sair, preciso confiar em mim mesmo!”

altTitles.ja: お姉ちゃんの翠くん

description.en: The manga centers on Sui, a girl in her third year of junior high. She doesn't really get along with her older sister's boyfriend, Midori-kun, since he always treats her like a kid and makes fun of her. But Midori-kun is suddenly asked to be Sui's home tutor.

altTitles.ja: かいじゅうの花束

description.en: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: Doumo, Zense de Satsuriku no Madougu wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou desu.

altTitles.ja: どうも、前世で殺戮の魔道具を作っていた子爵令嬢です。

description.en: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life.  On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

altTitles.ja: 誰そ彼のひと

description.en: One summer day, a boy named Tatsuomi Shiba arrives in the town where Riko, an eighth grader, lives. His family, who are related to the chairman of a major corporation, are welcomed by the townspeople, but Tatsuomi keeps his distance from everyone around him. Riko, who cannot leave him alone, makes memories of their summer together, and on his birthday, she promises Tatsuomi a gift and a promise. However, their happy days come to an end with the end of summer. Who is the person I fell in love with for the first time?
description.vi:
Đồng tác giả bộ truyện dài kỳ "Lửa Thiêu Nhà Mitarai" và "Arika của tôi". 
Mùa hè, một cậu bé tên Shiba Tatsuomi đã đặt chân đến thị trấn nơi Riko, một cô bé học lớp 8 đang sinh sống. Gia đình cậu, những người có quan hệ họ hàng với chủ tịch một công ty lớn đã được người dân thị trấn chào đón, thế nhưng Tatsuomi luôn giữ khoảng cách nhất định với những người xung quanh. Cảm thấy không thể để cậu bơ vơ một mình, Riko đã cùng Tatsuomi tạo nên những kỷ niệm trong mùa hè ấy và hứa sẽ tặng cậu một món quà vào ngày sinh nhật của cậu. 
Tuy nhiên, những ngày tràn đầy hạnh phúc đó rồi cũng kết thúc cùng với mùa hè của năm ấy. 
"Mối tình đầu của mình, thật ra là ai?"
